TopicTitle: Sr-71 Blackbird with mach 3+ performance and very agile

Articles.Content:
Introducing, the FIRE FERRETS.. Er, I mean the Sr-71 Blackbird! Enjoy the details and fuel capacity while knowing that with the right pilot, this plane can easily circumnavigate Kerbin and get back to Kerbin's main KSC.

Download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/b2qt76c406meudh/Sr-71.craft
Definitely lives up to the "Missiles? Outrun 'em!" Motto

I got the new D-21 up and running, although it has not been tested yet. I will therefore post the craft file in the future. All of my previous attempts have actually ended just as successfully as the real sr-71 and md-21 combination.

Or, here's a video to visualize my past endeavors with a detachable drone :

Edited June 6, 2014 by andrew123
Hope you get it working, however, i should note that you aren't using any of the fuel in the middle section, run the fuel lines from the front Mk. 2 fuel tank to the front Mk. 1's on both sides.

New update

The MD-21 has been successfully tested for the first time, although with some minor scratches and a very close series of accidents involved, but we have determined the first MD-21 is up for release. After release, set the probe core to control here.

Download link : https://www.dropbox.com/s/v8bf5htsrud46u6/Sr-71%20MD-21.craft

Edited August 24, 2013 by andrew123
